basics.name: skuUrnVersion
basics.label: Oracle WebLogic Image
basics.defaultValue: WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK11 on Oracle Linux 7.6
basics.toolTip: Choose Oracle WebLogic image, which is provided by Oracle, with Java and WebLogic preinstalled.

allowedValues.label: WebLogic Server 12.2.1.3.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.4
WebLogic Server 12.2.1.3.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.3
WebLogic Server 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK11 on Oracle Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK8 on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK11 on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6

basics.name: vmSizeSelect
basics.label: Virtual machine size
basics.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision.

basics.name: basicsRequired
basics.label: Credentials for Virtual Machines and WebLogic

elements.name: adminUsername
elements.label: Username for admin account of VMs
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

toolTip.authenticationType: Use username and password or SSH public key for authentication to the VM
toolTip.password: Password for admin account of VMs
toolTip.sshPublicKey: SSH key for admin account of VMs

constraints.customValidationMessage: Password must be at least 12 characters long and have 3 out of the following: one number, one lower case, one upper case, or one special character

elements.name: wlsUserName
elements.label: Username for WebLogic Administrator
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: wlsPassword
elements.toolTip: Password for WebLogic Administrator

constraints.validationMessage: The password must contain at least 12 characters, with at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number, and special characters are not allowed.

elements.name: basicsOptionalAcceptDefaults
elements.label: Accept defaults for optional configuration?
elements.toolTip: Select 'No' to edit optional basic configuration.

elements.name: wlsDomainName
elements.label: WebLogic Domain Name
elements.toolTip: The name of the WebLogic Domain to create.

constraints.validationMessage: The Domain Name must be between 3 and 20 characters long and contain letters, numbers only.

elements.name: enableAdminHTTPListenPort
elements.label: Enable HTTP listen port on WebLogic Administration Server?
elements.toolTip: Select 'No' to disable HTTP listen port on WebLogic Administration Server.

elements.name: useSystemAssignedManagedIdentity
elements.label: Create a system assigned managed identity to be created for the VM(s).
elements.toolTip: System assigned managed identities enable credential-free secure access to many Azure resources from this VM.

basics.name: howToReportIssues
basics.label: Report issues, get help, and share feedback

options.text: See the documentation for this offer.
If you encounter problems during the deployment of Oracle WebLogic Server, report them here.
If you want to interact directly with the Oracle WebLogic community, join the public Slack channel named 'oracle-weblogic'.
To get free help with Azure migration from the development team, fill out this survey.
Selecting 'Yes' here will cause the template to provision WebLogic Administration Console on HTTPS (Secure) port, with your own TLS/SSL certificate.

elements.name: enableCustomSSL
elements.label: Configure WebLogic Administration Console on HTTPS (Secure) port, with your own TLS/SSL certificate?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure WebLogic Administration Console on HTTPS (Secure) port with your own TLS/SSL certificate.

options.text: Choose an option for providing the TLS/SSL KeyStore and enter the values for the required fields:
⁃ Use KeyStores stored in Azure Key Vault.

elements.name: sslConfigurationAccessOption
elements.label: How would you like to provide required configuration
elements.toolTip: Select 'Upload existing KeyStores' to use local stored KeyStores.

allowedValues.label: Use KeyStores stored in Azure Key Vault

options.text: You must provide different files for identity and trust KeyStores. Select here for more details.

elements.name: uploadedCustomIdentityKeyStoreData
elements.label: Identity KeyStore Data file(.jks,.p12)
elements.toolTip: Identity KeyStore for TLS/SSL configuration

elements.name: uploadedCustomIdentityKeyStorePassphrase
elements.toolTip: The passphrase for the Identity KeyStore

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedCustomIdentityKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Identity KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

elements.name: uploadedPrivateKeyAlias
elements.label: The alias of the server's private key within the Identity KeyStore
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: uploadedPrivateKeyPassPhrase

label.password: The passphrase for the server's private key within the Identity KeyStore

elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedCustomTrustKeyStoreData
elements.label: Trust KeyStore Data file(.jks,.p12)
elements.toolTip: Trust KeyStore for TLS/SSL configuration.

elements.name: uploadedCustomTrustKeyStorePassPhrase
elements.toolTip: The passphrase for the Trust KeyStore

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedCustomTrustKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Trust KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

options.text: You must provide different files for identity and trust KeyStores. Select here for more details.

Enabling a HTTPS (Secure) port for the Administration Console requires you to obtain a valid TLS/SSL certificate. The template will look for the certificate and other configuration items in the Azure Key Vault specified here.

elements.name: keyVaultResourceGroup
elements.label: Resource group name in current subscription containing the Key Vault
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_sslConfiguration').keyVaultStoredCustomSSLSettings.keyVaultResourceGroup), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: keyVaultName
elements.label: Name of the Azure Key Vault containing secrets for the TLS/SSL certificate
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(or(greater(length(steps('section_sslConfiguration').keyVaultStoredCustomSSLSettings.keyVaultName), 24), less(length(steps('section_sslConfiguration').keyVaultStoredCustomSSLSettings.keyVaultName), 3)),'Vault name must be between 3-24 alphanumeric characters. The name must begin with a letter, end with a letter or digit, and not contain consecutive hyphens.','Vault name must only contain alphanumeric characters and dashes and cannot start with a number')]

elements.name: keyVaultCustomIdentityKeyStoreDataSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the Identity KeyStore Data
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomIdentityKeyStorePassPhraseSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the passphrase for the Identity KeyStore
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomIdentityKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Identity KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

elements.name: keyVaultPrivateKeyAliasSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the Private Key Alias
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultPrivateKeyPassPhraseSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the passphrase for the Private Key
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomTrustKeyStoreDataSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the Trust KeyStore Data
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomTrustKeyStorePassPhraseSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the passphrase for the Trust KeyStore
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomTrustKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Trust KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

options.text:
When creating a new virtual network, the subnet's address prefix is calculated automatically based on the virtual
network's address prefix. When using an existing virtual network, a minimum virtual network size of /28 and a
minimum subnet size of /29 are required. Additionally, the subnet must have adequate available addresses for
the server setup.

elements.name: denyPublicTrafficForAdminServer
elements.label: Deny public traffic for admin server?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to deny public traffic for admin server. Configuration here for port 7001 and 7002 has a higher priority than above.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here will cause the template to provision Oracle WebLogic Server Administration Console using custom DNS Name (example: admin.contoso.com)

elements.name: enableCustomDNS
elements.label: Configure Custom DNS Alias?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure Custom DNS Alias.

elements.name: dnsLabelPrefix
elements.label: DNS Label Prefix
elements.toolTip: The string to prepend to the DNS label.

constraints.validationMessage: The prefix must be between 3 and 10 characters long and contain letters, numbers only.

elements.name: portsToExpose
elements.label: Ports and port ranges to expose (N or N-N, comma separated)
elements.toolTip: Ports and port ranges to expose (N or N-N, comma separated)

constraints.validationMessage: Only numbers, hyphen separated ranges of numbers, separated by commas

elements.name: bringDNSZone
elements.label: Use an existing Azure DNS Zone
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure Custom DNS Alias based on an existing Azure DNS Zone. Select 'No' to create an Azure DNS Zone and Custom DNS Alias.

options.text: You must perform DNS Domain Delegation at your DNS Registry after deployment.

This option will add/update records in your Azure DNS Zone.The Azure identity deploying this feature must have one of the following two sets of Azure role-based access control roles:
  • Contributor and User Access Administrator of the current subscription.
  • Owner of the current subscription.

elements.name: dnszoneName
elements.label: DNS Zone Name
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers and periods to separate Domains

constraints.validationMessage: There must be between 2 and 34 labels. For example, "contoso.com" has 2 labels. Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.

elements.name: dnsZoneResourceGroup
elements.label: Name of the resource group which contains the DNS Zone in current subscription
elements.toolTip: Name of the resource group which contains the DNS Zone in current subscription

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_networkingConfiguration').existingDNSZonesSettings.dnsZoneResourceGroup), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: dnszoneAdminConsoleLabel
elements.label: Label for Oracle WebLogic Administration Console
elements.toolTip: Specify a label to generate subdomain of Oracle WebLogic Administration Console

validations.message: Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.
Subdomain must be between 2 and 34 labels. For example, "admin.contoso.com" has 3 labels.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here and providing the configuration will cause the template to configure the WebLogic Server to connect to the desired pre-existing database.  The database must be network accessible to the VNET and subnets created by the template.

elements.name: enableDB
elements.label: Connect to database?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' and provide required info to configure the connection to a database.

elements.name: databaseType
elements.label: Choose database type
elements.toolTip: Choose database type

allowedValues.label: Azure database for PostgreSQL (with support for passwordless connection)
Azure SQL (with support for passwordless connection)

options.text:
To support passwordless connection and various functionalities, the offer will upgrade the
Oracle WebLogic Server MySQL driver with recent MySQL Connector Java driver.

elements.name: jdbcDataSourceName
elements.label: JNDI Name
elements.toolTip: The JNDI name for the database JDBC connection

validations.message: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters, numbers, and slashes (/).

elements.name: dsConnectionURL
elements.label: DataSource Connection String
elements.toolTip: The JDBC connection string for the database

validations.message: A valid JDBC URL must start with 'jdbc:'.
A valid JDBC URL for the chosen database type must be provided.

The offer will append defaultAuthenticationPlugin, authenticationPlugins with Azure provided plugins, and append azure.clientId with your managed identity client ID automatically, please do not specify them in your connection string.

The offer will append authenticationPluginClassName with Azure provided plugins, and append azure.clientId with your managed identity client ID automatically, please do not specify them in your connection string.
The offer will append authentication with ActiveDirectoryMSI, and append msiClientId with your managed identity client ID automatically, please do not specify them in your connection string.
You must select at least one managed identity that has access to your database.

elements.name: dbGlobalTranPro
elements.label: Global transactions protocol
elements.toolTip: Determines the transaction protocol (global transaction processing behavior) for the data source.

allowedValues.label: TwoPhaseCommit
allowedValues.description: Standard XA transaction processing. Requires an XA driver.

allowedValues.label: LoggingLastResource
allowedValues.description: A performance enhancement for one non-XA resource.

allowedValues.label: EmulateTwoPhaseCommit
allowedValues.description: Enables one non-XA resource to participate in a global transaction, but has some risk to data.

allowedValues.label: OnePhaseCommit
allowedValues.description: One-phase XA transaction processing using a non-XA driver. This is the default setting.

elements.name: enablePswlessConnection0
elements.label: Use passwordless datasource connection
elements.toolTip: Use passwordless datasource connection.

elements.name: dbUser
elements.label: Database username
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

validations.message: The value must be 1-128 characters long and must only contain letters, numbers, hyphen(-) and the at sign, no hyphen allowed at the beginning and the end of database username.
You must select at least one managed identity that has access to your database.

elements.name: enablePswlessConnection
elements.label: Use passwordless datasource connection
elements.toolTip: Use passwordless datasource connection.

elements.name: dbPassword
elements.toolTip: Database Password

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be between 5 and 128 characters long and have at least one number.

toolTip.userAssignedIdentity: Select a user assigned identity that has access to your database. For how to create a database user for your managed identity, see https://aka.ms/javaee-db-identity.
